content: gnittinkdhda www adhdknitting com you will need hooks rx my ex crochet size h-8 k-10 5 difficulty medium use with 1 ball crystal palace fjord in a hair color of your choice hc darning needle 1 ball crystal palace fjord in a skin color of your choice single_crochet carded roving for needle felting and/or yarn or embroidery thread for detailing features on the face beads special technique crochet 2 together insert hook into stitch then insert hook into the next stitch wrap and pull through both stitches to decrease to one stitch directions with smaller hook and hair color hc yarn chain 36 join chain so you can crochet in the round rounds 1 - 3 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet each chain around round 4 chain 3 double_crochet 2 chain 2 *double_crochet 3 ch2* repeat around to last 2 sts dc2 chain 2 round 5 chain 3 double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 into first chain 2 space * double_crochet 3 double_crochet 1 into chain 2 space* repeat around round 6 chain 3 double_crochet around switch to larger hook and skin color single_crochet yarn round 7 ch1 *single_crochet 1 decrease* repeat around round 8 ch3 *double_crochet twice into 1st st double_crochet into next st* repeat around round 9 12 double_crochet each st around begin decreases for bag shaping round 13 ch2 *half_double_crochet 7 hdc2tog* round 14 ch3 double_crochet each st around round 15 ch2 *half_double_crochet 6 hdc2tog* to last 2 half_double_crochet 2 round 16 ch3 double_crochet each st around round 17 ch2 *hdc4 hdc2tog* to last st half_double_crochet 1 rounds 18 and 19 ch2 hdc2tog each st around break yarn leaving tail thread tail through darning needle and sew together the small hole at the bottom of bag this can be a little messy since you will felt it once it s done dreadlock edge where the hc and single_crochet meet at the top of bag take smaller hook and hc and join in and double_crochet 36 sts around that edge note to do this insert hook into the bar of the bottom double_crochet st and ch3 double_crochet around through each st around at end of round connect the sides to make it in the round again round 2 ch3 double_crochet 1 ch2 *dc2 ch2* repeat around round 3 ch1 single_crochet into 1st st *single_crochet into chain 1 space single_crochet 2* single_crochet 1 into last ch2 space break yarn note photos shown are of kintted exes and are for example only page 1/2 design original pattern and sample by gail pasqualotto reverse pattern writer daniella cortez gnittinkdhda www adhdknitting com strap with larger hook and hc yarn chain for desired length of strap if you d like the strap to be dense single_crochet or half_double_crochet along the row one or two row once bag and strap are felted you will thread this strap through the eyelets on the top part of the bag dreads with smaller hook and hc chain for desired length of dread locks 15-20 works well
